fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.SummaryPanelEst.disputeMeeting.EADRDisputeTable.Row1.tableItem11"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"if(this.value==\\"Y\\"){ \\n EADRPCPTable.visible=false;\\n if(textbox1652851019334.value!==null){\\n for(var j=0;j<textbox1652851019334.value; j++){\\n \\tEADRPCPRow1.instanceManager.removeInstance(1);\\n }\\n }\\n var disID = EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[this.parent.instanceIndex].table1_item1.value;\\n EADRPCPTable.visible=true;\\n var dollarUSLocale = Intl.NumberFormat('en-US');\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n \\t\\tdata: {'DisputeID':disID}\,\\n contentType: 'application/json'\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080'+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetPCPDetails'\,\\n dataType: \\"json\\"\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n // console.log(data);\\n textbox1652851019334.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.length;\\n if(parseInt(data.PCP_Details.Record.length)===1){\\n EADRPCPRow1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n \\t\\tEADRPCPItem11.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.PCP_MAIN_PK;\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record.D_IPC_DESCR!==\\"null\\"){\\n headerItem16528478188541652847819037.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.D_IPC_DESCR;\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record.E_EST_COST!==\\"null\\"){\\n headerItem16528478138731652847814057.value=\\"$ \\"+dollarUSLocale.format(data.PCP_Details.Record.E_EST_COST);\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record.E_TIME_IMPACT!==\\"null\\"){\\n headerItem16528478095261652847809695.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.E_TIME_IMPACT;\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record.E_REC_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n EADRPCPItem12.value=data.PCP_Details.Record.E_REC_DATE;\\n }\\n EADRPCPRow1.visible=true;\\n } \\n else{\\n for(var i=0; i<data.PCP_Details.Record.length; i++){\\n\\t\\t\\t\\tEADRPCPRow1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n \\t\\tEADRPCPItem11.value=data.PCP_Details.Record[i].PCP_MAIN_PK;\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].D_IPC_DESCR!==\\"null\\"){\\n headerItem16528478188541652847819037.value=data.PCP_Details.Record[i].D_IPC_DESCR;\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_EST_COST!==\\"null\\"){\\n headerItem16528478138731652847814057.value=\\"$ \\"+dollarUSLocale.format(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_EST_COST);\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_TIME_IMPACT!==\\"null\\"){\\n headerItem16528478095261652847809695.value=data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_TIME_IMPACT;\\n }\\n if(data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_REC_DATE!==\\"null\\"){\\n EADRPCPItem12.value=data.PCP_Details.Record[i].E_REC_DATE;\\n }\\n EADRPCPRow1.visible=true;\\n } \\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n });\\n var cCount = this.parent.instanceIndex;\\n //alert(cCount);\\n var tCount = this.parent.instanceManager.instanceCount;\\n //alert(tCount);\\n for(var k=0; k<tCount; k++){\\n \\tif(k!==cCount){\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[k].tableItem11.value =null;\\n }\\n }\\n}\\n/*if(this.value===null){\\n table_2.visible=false;\\n //table_2.resetData();\\n for(var j=0;j<textbox1652851019334.value; j++){\\n Tabel2Row1.instanceManager.removeInstance(1);\\n }\\t\\t\\n \\n}*/\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"//fetch dispute details from ea and district\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\nea.value=actualData.ea;\\ndistrict.value=actualData.district;\\nvar jsonData={'ea':ea.value\,'district':district.value\,'InfoType':'Partial'};\\n//console.log(jsonData); \\n$.ajax({ \\n\\t type: 'GET'\, \\n\\t contentType: 'application/json'\,\\n\\t url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080'+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetDisputeMeetings'\,\\n \\t data : jsonData\,\\n\\t //dataType: \\"json\\"\,\\n\\t success: function (data) { \\n \\t//console.log(data);\\n //console.log(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n count=parseInt(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n if(count>0){\\n jsonResponse = JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DRBMembersDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n //console.log(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_MEETING_ID);\\n //console.log(data.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.length);\\n \\tif(count===1){\\n \\tEADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.OVERALL_STATUS;\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.NAME;\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.CLOSED_DISPUTE_COMMENTS!==\\"null\\"){\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.CLOSED_DISPUTE_COMMENTS; \\n }\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n \\t}\\n else{\\n for(var i=0; i<count; i++){ \\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].OVERALL_STATUS;\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].NAME;\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].CLOSED_DISPUTE_COMMENTS!==\\"null\\"){\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].CLOSED_DISPUTE_COMMENTS; \\n }\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].visible=true;\\n } \\n } \\n }\\n\\t }\,\\n\\t error: function(err){\\n\\t\\talert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n\\t }\\n});"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.SummaryPanelEst.disputeMeeting"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.progressMeeting.table3.Row1.table3_item1"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"if(this.value==\\"Y\\"){ \\nvar cCount = this.parent.instanceIndex;\\n var tCount = this.parent.instanceManager.instanceCount;\\n for(var k=0; k<tCount; k++){\\n \\tif(k!==cCount){\\n table3.Row1.instanceManager.instances[k].table3_item1.value =null;\\n }\\n }\\n}\\n\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":" $.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n contentType: 'application/json'\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080'+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetProgressMeetingDetails:1.0'\,\\n dataType: \\"json\\"\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n //console.log(data);\\n for(var i=0; i<data.Dispute_Meetings.Record.length; i++){ \\n\\t\\t\\ttable3.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1); \\n table3.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table3_item2.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].PROGRESS_MEETING_ID;\\n table3.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table3_item3.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].OVERALL_STATUS;\\n table3.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table3_item4.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].CHAIR_ADVISOR_STATUS;\\n table3.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table3_item5.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].RE_STATUS;\\n table3.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table3_item6.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].CONTRACTOR_STATUS;\\n \\ttable3.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].visible=true;\\n } \\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n });"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.SummaryPanelEst.progressMeeting"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

[{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":" $.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n contentType: 'application/json'\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080'+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetDisputeMeetings:1.0'\,\\n dataType: \\"json\\"\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n // alert(data.Dispute_Meetings.Record.length);\\n for(var i=0; i<data.Dispute_Meetings.Record.length; i++){\\n\\t\\t\\t\\tdisputeMeeting.table1652681758999.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n //tableItem11.value=data[i].Select;\\n headerItem16526821894551652682189632.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n disputeMeeting.table1652681758999.Row1.tableItem12.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].DISPUTE_MEETING_STATUS;\\n headerItem16526821204381652682120608.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].CREATED_BY;\\n headerItem16526822078921652682208157.value=data.Dispute_Meetings.Record[i].CLOSED_DISPUTEMEET_COMMENTS;\\n disputeMeeting.table1652681758999.Row1.visible=true;\\n } \\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n });"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":false}]
